mapper.select: select INDEX_NO as indexNo, DT_NO as dtNo, DT_TYPE as dtType, DT_TITLE as dtTitle, DT_MAIN_PHOTO as dtMainPhoto, DT_WRITER_NO as dtWriterNo, DT_EXPLAIN as dtExplain, DT_DATE as dtDate, DT_HITS as dtHits, DT_SEE as dtSee from (select DIETTIP_TB.*, row_number() over(order by DT_DATE desc) as num from DIETTIP_TB) where num between #{start} and #{end}
